item.title: Minecraft Server Hosting
item.description: We can set up and host professional quality custom Minecraft servers, adapted to your needs.

item.title: Secure Phones
item.description: Overview We can provide you with a modern mobile phone with high security and privacy, by installing a secure OS free from Google’s invasive tactics which is called GrapheneOS. We will also provision some setup on this phone. Optionally, we can set up a secondary area on your phone which has some Google services, albeit less invasive than the average smartphone and completely separated from your main area, keeping your data safe.
